DOC.brief_summary: A study compare pharmacokinetics ( PK ) dry fill capsule ( DFC ) & oral compress tablet ( OCT ) formulation MK-0941-009 & assess effect food OCT formulation .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Pharmacokinetics & Food Effect MK-0941 Adults With Type 2 Diabetes ( MK-0941-009 )
DOC.criteria: Males female ( nonchildbearing potential ) age 18 70 Participants diagnose Type 2 Diabetes Participants nonsmoker least 6 month Participant diagnose Type 1 diabetes Participant receive insulin PPAR gamma agonists 12 week prior study start Participant recent history eye infection inflammatory eye condition within 2 week prior study start Participant diagnose glaucoma blind Participant trauma one eye Participant major surgery , donate blood participate another clinical study past 4 week Participant regular user illicit drug history drug , include alcohol , abuse past 6 month
